name: Insurance contracts; punitive damages
text:
§431:10-240  Insurance contracts; punitive damages.  Coverage under any policy of insurance issued in this State shall not be construed to provide coverage for punitive or exemplary damages unless specifically included. [L 1987, c 347, pt of §2]
